How (not) to prompt ChatGPT.

(a step-by-step guide worth saving)

1. Go to ChatGPT.
2. On the left menu → Click on “GPTs”.
3. Search for my GPT: "Prompt Maker".
4. Type your bad prompt (= what you want).
5. The Prompt Maker will generate a better version.

Access my blog "How (not) to prompt ChatGPT" by clicking: https://lnkd.in/edwXnKRa.
